snippet: Nechama Rothberger, who struck a deliveryman in September 2010, agreed to serve five years of probation and to contribute 100 hours of community service.
abstract: Nechama Rothberger, who struck a deliveryman in September 2010, agreed to serve five years of probation and to contribute 100 hours of community service.

headline.main: Driver Who Fatally Struck Man While Texting Avoids Jail
